attributes.action: Ban immediately the use of dogs in scientific and regulatory procedures.
attributes.additional_details: I want facilities like MBR acres to cease all their breeding programmes and for the United Kingdom to end testing on dogs. We are supposed to be a civilised nation, not one built on cruelty. We should aim to become a more ethical society, building a better place to live for our children. A nation that does not treat its animals fairly is not the kind of nation that the United Kingdom should be.
attributes.background: As a first step to end animal testing, it is crucial to implement an immediate ban on testing on dogs. The United Kingdom should be a leading voice in the decision to ban ALL inhumane testing in the civilised world. There are many ethical alternatives to animal testing.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

End testing on dogs and other animals for development of products for human use
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/736578
